00012 // IdCounter class definition
00013 // automatically tags the derived object with an positive integer, which is accessible trhough the method id()
00015 
00016 template <class CountedType>
00017 class IdCounter
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     const Size & id() const {
00021         return id_;
00022     }
00023 protected:
00024     IdCounter() : id_(static_counter_++) {}
00025 private:
00026     static Size static_counter_;
00027     const Size id_;
00028 };
00029 
00030 template <class CountedType> Size IdCounter<CountedType>::static_counter_ = 0;
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034 #endif // !defined(IDCOUNTER_H)
